item.title: Organization Details Configuration Guide
item.description: Complete guide to configuring organization details in Virima including departments, locations, cost centers, and operational hours.
item.dc:creator: Virima
item.ai:summary: Configure organizational structure in Virima Admin including departments, locations, cost centers, designations, holidays, and operational hours.

ai:qa.ai:question: How to configure organization details in Virima?
ai:qa.ai:answer: Navigate to Admin > Organization Details to configure departments, locations, cost centers, and other organizational settings.

item.title: Cost Center Management in Virima
item.description: Learn how to create and manage cost centers for financial tracking and budget allocation in Virima.
item.dc:creator: Virima
item.ai:summary: Create and manage cost centers through Admin > Organization Details > Cost Center for expense tracking and budget allocation.
item.ai:keywords: cost center, budget, financial management, Virima

ai:qa.ai:question: How to create cost centers in Virima?
ai:qa.ai:answer: Go to Admin > Organization Details > Cost Center and click New to create a cost center with code, name, and budget.

item.title: Departments Management Guide
item.description: Comprehensive guide to managing departments, assigning members, and establishing organizational hierarchies in Virima.
item.dc:creator: Virima
item.ai:summary: Manage departments through Admin > Organization Details > Departments to create, edit, and establish department hierarchies.

ai:qa.ai:question: How to manage departments in Virima?
ai:qa.ai:answer: Access Admin > Organization Details > Departments to create, edit, delete departments and assign members.

ai:qa.ai:question: What are Admin Functions in Virima?
ai:qa.ai:answer: Admin Functions provide comprehensive administrative capabilities for system configuration, user management, and organizational setup.
